DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study 1 ) compare effectiveness 1 hour/day binocular game play 7 day per week ( minimum 4 day per week ) 2 hours/day patch 7 day per week , child 5 < 13 year age ( young cohort ) , non-inferiority study ; 2 ) compare effectiveness 1 hour/day binocular game play 7 day per week ( minimum 4 day per week ) 2 hours/day patch 7 day per week , child 13 < 17 year age ( old cohort ) , superiority study .
